amendment.description: To provide that certain amounts appropriated for the Port of Anchorage for an intermodal marine facility shall be subject only to conditions and requirements required by the Maritime Administration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 160 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 160 proposed by Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S1406-1408; text: CR S1407) To provide that certain amounts appropriated for the Port of Anchorage for an intermodal marine facility shall be subject only to conditions and requirements required by the Maritime Administration.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 160 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 160 proposed by Senator Stevens.
